name: T! At Nite! por marianolinx v1
description: Tema oscuro para Taringa y Poringa(entre otros) adapatable a pantallas HD y FullHD
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
@-moz-document domain("taringa.net")
, domain("poringa.net")
, domain("identi.li")
, domain("udenti.li")
, domain("porniteca.li")
, domain("noref.li")
, domain("socialdenti.com")
, domain("socialphy.com")
, domain("downtwarez.com")
, domain("ba-k.com")
, domain("jarochos.net")
, domain("forodirecto.com")
, domain("vagoslatino.com")
, domain("exvagos.com")
, domain("avaxhome.ws")
, domain("avaxsearch.com")
, domain("pixhost.me")
, domain("chilecomparte.cl")
, domain("intercambiosvirtuales.org")
, domain("intercambiosos.org")
, domain("gratisprogramas.org")
, domain("gratispeliculas.org")
, domain("gratismusica.org") {

/* Change Cursors
*/
*     {cursor: url("http://reloaded.site88.net/Data/aero_arrow.cur")
, default !important}
a, a * {cursor: url("http://reloaded.site88.net/Data/aero_link.cur")
, pointer !important}

html  ,

html *:not(:empty) ,

html *:after ,
html *:before
{
background-color:rgba(0,0,0,1)!important;
}

html
{ background-color : #333 !important
; border-color     : #444 !important
}

body
{ background-color : transparent !important
; border-color     : #666 !important
; color            : #ccc !important
}

body * ,
html *:after ,
html *:before
{ background-color : transparent !important
; border-color     : #666        !important
; color            : inherit     !important
; text-shadow      : none        !important
}

.head  ,
.header  ,
*[id*="title"]  ,
*[id*="Title"]  ,
*[id*="head"]  ,
*[id*="Head"]  ,
*[class*="header"]  ,
*[class*="Header"]  ,
*[id*="hlavicka"]  ,
*[id*="Hlavicka"]  ,
*[class*="hlavicka"]  ,
*[class*="Hlavicka"]
{ background-color : #404040 !important
}

header  ,
#head  ,
#header  ,
#top
{ background-color : #444 !important
}

.navlist a  ,
.Navlist a  ,
*.navigation a  ,
*[id*="menu"] a  ,
*[id*="Menu"] a  ,
*[id*="navig"] a  ,
*[id*="Navig"] a  ,
*[id*="-nav"] a  ,
*[id*="-Nav"] a  ,
*[id$="nav"] a  ,
*[id$="Nav"] a  ,
*[class*="menu"] a  ,
*[class*="Menu"] a  ,
*[class*="navig"] a  ,
*[class*="Navig"] a  ,
*[class*="-nav"] a  ,
*[class*="-Nav"] a  ,
*[class$="nav"] a  ,
*[class$="Nav"] a
{ background-color : #227 !important
}

label  , 
nav a  ,
menu a  ,
#menu a  ,
#navigation a
{ background-color : #222 !important
}

div[class*=menu][class*=vertical]
{ background-color: #334 !important
}

#menu a:hover  ,
#navigation a:hover
,
*[class*="menu"][class*="item"]:hover
{ background-color : #000 !important
}

div[id*="side"]  ,
div[id*="Side"]  ,
div[class*="side"]  ,
div[class*="Side"]
{ background-color : #000 !important
}

aside  ,
.aside  ,
#aside
{ background-color : #444 !important
}

#main{width:90%!important;min-width:1000px;border:1px solid cyan!important;border-radius:10px!important;}
#main-col{width:70%!important;}
#sidebar{width:24%!important;}
#left-col{width:60%!important}
#right-col{width:28%!important}
#full-col{width:100%!important;}
#header{background-color:red!important;}
.post-content{;width:99%!important;}

footer  ,
div[id*="foot"]  ,
div[class*="foot"]  ,
div[id*="paticka"]  ,
div[class*="paticka"]
{ background-color : #444 !important
}

*[class*="heading"]  ,
*[class*="Heading"]  ,
*[id*="heading"]  ,
*[id*="Heading"]  ,
*[class*="nadpis"]  ,
*[class*="Nadpis"]  ,
*[id*="nadpis"]  ,
*[id*="Nadpis"]
{ border-color : #888 !important
; color        : #eee !important
}

h1
{ background-color : #000 !important
; border-color     : #eee !important
; color            : #fff !important
}

h2  ,
h3  ,
h4  ,
h5  ,
h6  ,
caption  , 
thead  ,
th  ,
lh  , 
dl dt  , 
html fieldset legend   
{ background-color : #222 !important
; border-color     : #999 !important
; color            : #eee !important
}

blockquote  ,
code  , 
xmp  ,
pre
{ background-color : #444 !important
}

td
{ border-color     : #555 !important
}

hr
{ background-color : #666 !important
; border-color     : #666 !important
; color            : #666 !important
}

*[id*="important"]  ,
*[id*="Important"]  ,
*[class*="important"]  ,
*[class*="Important"]
{ border-color : #666 !important
; color        : #fff !important
}

b  ,
b *  ,
i  ,
i *
{ border-color : #555 !important
; color        : #eee !important
}

em  ,
em *  ,
strong  ,
strong *
{ border-color : #666 !important
; color        : #fff !important
}

#current  ,
#selected  ,
#active  ,
.current  ,
.selected  ,
.active  ,
.current a ,
.selected a  ,
.active a
{ background-color : #000 !important
; color            : #fff !important
}

*[id*=Current]  ,
*[id*=Selected]  ,
*[id*=Active]  ,
*[id*=current]  ,
*[id*=selected]  ,
*[id*=active] ,
*[class*=Current]  ,
*[class*=Selected]  ,
*[class*=Active]  ,
*[class*=current]  ,
*[class*=selected]  ,
*[class*=active] ,
*[id*=Current] a ,
*[id*=Selected] a  ,
*[id*=Active] a  ,
*[id*=current] a  ,
*[id*=selected] a  ,
*[id*=active] a ,
*[class*=Current] a  ,
*[class*=Selected] a  ,
*[class*=Active] a  ,
*[class*=current] a  ,
*[class*=selected] a  ,
*[class*=active] a
{ background-color : #111 !important
; color            : #eee !important
}

.copyright
{ color : #ccc !important
}
.error
{ color : #f66 !important
}
.warning
{ color : #f99 !important
}
.example
{ color : #cff !important
}
.issue
{ color : #f99 !important
}
.note
{ color : #cff !important
}
.search
{ color : #cff !important
}

*[irrelevant]
{
}


table
{ background-color: transparent !important
}
thead , tfoot
{ background-color: #333 !important
}

html body *[onclick]:hover ,
html body *[ondblclick]:hover ,
a[href^='javascript:'] ,
a[href='#']
{ background-color : #300 !important
}

label[for]  ,
a:link  ,
a:link *
{ border-color : #399 !important
; color        : #9ef !important
}

label[for]:focus  ,
label[for]:hover  ,
a:link:focus  ,
a:link:hover
{
 background-color : #000 !important
; border-color     : #9ef !important
; color            : #fff !important
}

a:link:focus *  ,
a:link:hover *
{ border-color : #9ef !important
; color        : #eff !important
}

a:visited  ,
a:visited *
{ border-color : #690 !important
; color        : #9c3 !important
}

a:visited:focus  ,
a:visited:hover
{ background-color : #000 !important
; border-color     : #9c3 !important
; color            : #cf9 !important
}

a:visited:focus *  ,
a:visited:hover *
{ border-color : #9c3 !important
; color        : #cf9 !important
}

a:active  ,
a:active *
{ border-color : #600 !important
; color        : #f33 !important
}

html button  ,
html select  ,
html input
{ background-color : #222 !important
}

html input[type="password"]
{ background-color : #755 !important
}

html textarea  ,
html input[type="text"]  ,
html input:not([type])
{ background-color : #555 !important
; color: #fff !important
}

html textarea:hover  ,
html input[type="text"]:hover  ,
html input:not([type]):hover
{
}

html input:hover ,
html button:hover ,
html select:hover ,
html textarea:hover
{ color : #fff !important
; border-color: #ccc !important
; background-color : #444 !important
}

html textarea:focus  ,
html input:focus  ,
html textarea:focus ,
html button:focus
{ background-color : #000 !important
; border-color     : #999 !important
; color: #ccc !important
}
html textarea:focus:hover  ,
html input:focus:hover  ,
html button:focus:hover ,
html textarea:focus:hover
{ border-color     : #fff !important
}

html input[type="password"]:focus
{ background-color : #300 !important
}

input[disabled]
{ color : #888 !important
}

html button  ,
html select  ,
html input  ,
html textarea
{ -moz-appearance : none !important
; background-image: none !important 
}

*[class*='content']  ,
li:hover li
{ background-color : transparent !important
}

div[id^=webdeveloper]
{ background-color : #333 !important
}

div[style~="url(chrome://flashblock/content/flash.png)"]
{ background-color : #630 !important
}

td.quantifier > div  ,
div.graph > div#tomGraph
{ background-color : #222 !important
}

span#__firefox-findbar-search-id
{ background-color : #9ff !important
}

#pop
{ background-color : #222 !important
}

div#lbHoverNav a#lbPrev ,
div#lbHoverNav a#lbNext
{ background-color:  transparent !important
}

div[style~="url(chrome://flashblock/content/flash.png)"]
{ background-color : #630 !important
}

Body,

Div#footer,

Div.ui-ac.ui-dialog-content.ui-widget-content,

Div.title.clearfix,

Div.clearfix.comment-box.my-comment,

Div.clearfix.comment-box.is-staff,

Div.rating1.nonsticky,
Div.rating2.nonsticky,
Div.rating3.nonsticky,
Div.rating4.nonsticky,
Div.rating5.nonsticky,
Div.rating6.nonsticky,
Div.rating7.nonsticky,
Div.rating8.nonsticky,
Div.rating9.nonsticky,
Div.icon0.rating0.nonsticky,

Div.threadpostedin.td.alt,
Div.dialog-preview.ui-dialog-content.ui-widget-content,
Div.ui-dialog-buttonpane.ui-widget-content.ui-helper-clearfix,
Div#reify-bugmenot-bmnWrapper14.reify-bugmenot-bmnWrapper,
Div#full-col.post,
form#scbar_form,
#jqContextMenu,
#seguir,
#unirse,
#divResult,
#divDic,
A.nombre,
A.btn.v.radio-on,
A.require-login.button.ui-button.ui-widget.ui-state-default.ui-corner-all.ui-button-text-only,
A.btn.g.require-login,

A.btn.g.join,
A.btn.v.floatR,
A.button.tags.ui-button.ui-widget.ui-state-default.ui-corner-all.ui-button-text-only,
Body#index,
dl.threadlastpost.td.alt,
dl.threadlastpost.td,
dl.threadimod.td,
Input.text-inp.text.cuenta-save-1.ui-corner-all.form-input-text.box-shadow-soft,
Li.clearfix.tema_sticky,
Li,
Li.imodselector.threadbit,
Li#tb_1.hdm-hover,
P.nonthread,
Span.ui-button-text,
Span.show-more,
Table.obertka,
Td.thead,
Ul.floatcontainer,
Ul.clearfix,
Ul.threadstats.td.alt,
Ul.zebra_recent,
Ul.post-share-bottom.rounded.clearfix.post-share-list,
Html#vbulletin_html,
H2,
H3.blocksubhead
{
background:black!important;
Fixed Repeat Center !important
; Background-color: transparent !important
; Color: lightcyan !important
}
a:Link
{	-webkit-transition: all 3s ease; -moz-transition: all 3s ease; -o-transition: all 3s ease;
Color: #8df!important
}
a:Visited
{-webkit-transition: all 3s ease; -moz-transition: all 3s ease; -o-transition: all 3s ease;
Color: yellowgreen!important
}
a:Hover
{	-webkit-transition: all 0.3s ease; -moz-transition: all 0.3s ease; -o-transition: all 0.3s ease;
;Text-decoration: none !important;border:1px solid red;border-radius:5px;
}
a{-webkit-transition: all 1s ease!important; -moz-transition: all 1s ease!important; -o-transition: all 1s ease!important;
}
Div
{
Background: none
; Background-color: Transparent !important
; Color:  gray !important
}

}
